mapper.select: select left(sidoCode,2) sidoCode, sidoName from sidocode order by sidoCode
select left(gugunCode,5) gugunCode, gugunName from guguncode where left(gugunCode,2) = #{sido} order by gugunName
select distinct dongName, dongCode from houseinfo where left(dongCode, 5) = #{gugun} order by dongName

select i.aptCode aptCode, i.aptName aptName, i.dongCode dongCode, i.dongName dongName, i.lat lat, i.lng lng, d.floor floor , i.buildYear buildYear, i.jibun jibun, d.dealAmount recentPrice, round(d.area,2) area, round(d.area/3.3057, 2) acreage from housedeal d inner join houseinfo i on d.aptCode = i.aptCode and d.no = (select max(no) from housedeal where aptCode = d.aptCode) where dongCode = #{dong} order by aptName;
select hangjungCode from hangjungcode where dongCode = #{dong} limit 1

select d.dealAmount recentPrice, d.dealYear dealYear, d.dealMonth dealMonth, d.dealDay dealDay, d.floor floor, round(d.area,2) area, round(d.area/3.3057, 2) acreage from houseinfo i inner join housedeal d on i.aptCode = d.aptCode where i.aptCode = #{aptCode}

select * from ( select train, station, jibun, lat, lng, ( 6371 * acos( cos( radians( #{lat} ) ) * cos( radians( lat) ) * cos( radians( lng ) - radians(#{lng}) ) + sin( radians(#{lat}) ) * sin( radians(lat) ) ) ) AS distance from subway ) DATA where DATA.distance < 0.7

select * from ( select ars, station, lat,lng, ( 6371 * acos( cos( radians( #{lat} ) ) * cos( radians( lat) ) * cos( radians( lng ) - radians(#{lng}) ) + sin( radians(#{lat}) ) * sin( radians(lat) ) ) ) AS distance from bus ) DATA where DATA.distance < 0.5

select * from ( select place, placedetail, maxcount, btype, lat, lng, ( 6371 * acos( cos( radians( #{lat} ) ) * cos( radians( lat) ) * cos( radians( lng ) - radians(#{lng}) ) + sin( radians(#{lat}) ) * sin( radians(lat) ) ) ) AS distance from bike ) DATA where DATA.distance < 0.7

select * from( select i.aptCode aptCode, i.aptName aptName, i.dongCode dongCode, i.dongName dongName, i.lat lat, i.lng lng, d.floor floor , i.buildYear buildYear, i.jibun jibun, d.dealAmount recentPrice, round(d.area,2) area, round(d.area/3.3057, 2) acreage, ( 6371 * acos( cos( radians( #{lat} ) ) * cos( radians( lat) ) * cos( radians( lng ) - radians(#{lng}) ) + sin( radians(#{lat}) ) * sin( radians(lat) ) ) ) AS distance from housedeal d inner join houseinfo i on d.aptCode = i.aptCode and d.no = (select max(no) from housedeal where aptCode = d.aptCode) )DATA where DATA.distance <= 2 order by aptName
select train, station, jibun, lat, lng from subway;
